column2: Biden Day Ninety-Seven:  The First 100 Days
column5: Unarmed black man shot in back of the head in Elizabeth N.C.  The sheriff will not release a video of body cam.  Only the judge can release the video sheriff says.  Protests calm. Sensus show Repubs get more house seats in Tex and Fla and spread sparsely across America.  Did Trump Administration have anything to do with this? Trump Administration carried this out.  Repubs target suppression of Texas Dem. voters.  Merrick Garland opens an ‘investigation into not only Minneapolis but also Louisville’s policing practices specifically Breonna Taylor.  The new police chief welcomes the investigation.  ‘Bout time!
